product_name: Komperdell Carbon Expedition Solid 4 Trekking Poles - Pair - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Komperdell Carbon Expedition Solid 4 Trekking Poles fold down to a very small packed size. Their carbon and aluminum alloy construction makes them lightweight yet strong to assist your hiking. 100% carbon upper shafts and Titanal aluminum alloy lower shafts feature an ingenious foldable Approach 1.0 mechanism. EVA foam grips are heat-insulating and lighter weight than traditional grips; padded wrist straps offer a high level of comfort. Trekking basket/tip construction with pivoting ball mechanisms allow for optimal adjustment to any terrain. The Komperdell Carbon Expedition Solid 4 Trekking Poles feature tungsten carbide tips. Closeout.
short_description: Komperdell Carbon Expedition Solid 4 Trekking Poles fold down to a very small packed size. Their carbon and aluminum alloy construction makes them lightweight yet strong to assist your hiking.
